name: Kafka to BigQuery
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads JSON encoded messages from Apache Kafka, optionally uses a Javascript UDF to transform the message data, and writes the results to a BigQuery table.

parameters.name: kafkaConsumerProperties
parameters.label: GCS location of Kafka consumer properties.
parameters.helpText: GCS location of your Kafka consumer properties file.

parameters.name: kafkaProducerProperties
parameters.label: GCS location of Kafka producer properties.
parameters.helpText: GCS location of your Kafka producer properties file.

parameters.name: kafkaSystemProperties
parameters.label: GCS location of Kafka system properties for configuring the JVM.
parameters.helpText: GCS location of your Kafka system properties file.

parameters.name: outputTableSpec
parameters.label: BigQuery table specification
parameters.helpText: BigQuery output table spec in the form 'project:dataset.table'

parameters.name: javascriptTextTransformGcsPath
parameters.label: Javascript transformation script.
parameters.helpText: GCS path to a Javascript program for element transformation.

parameters.name: javascriptTextTransformFunctionName
parameters.label: Javscript transformation function name.
parameters.helpText: The name of the Javascript function to execute.
